titles.title: To make technical corrections to the Veterans Benefits Improvement Act of 2004.
To make technical corrections to the Veterans Benefits Improvement Act of 2004.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Provisions of This Measure Incorporated in H.R. 2046, Section 4.

bill.summary: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to restore the specially adapted housing assistance for certain active-duty members of the Armed Forces which was deleted by provisions of the Veterans Benefits Improvement Act of 2004 and which created similar assistance for certain disabled veterans.
